question.title: Notification React-Native (Android)
question.body:
How can we customize our notification like keeping our user profile image on the left side of the notification like the below image i need the profile image or any static image on the left of the notifcation (https://i.sstatic.net/TFpaVxJj.png)

I have tried using CustomNotificationModule using Bitmap and Glider

Notification notification = new NotificationCompat.Builder(this, CHANNEL_ID)

But it is not working is there any other ways to obtain the ui like Like that i need the profile image in the my application's notification how to obtain it in android

Or any other ways to customize the notification in android

question_comments.body: What are you using for notification?
